About

Hello World!

I am Michel, a French born Chinese guy — I think that is how we say, I basically look like a Chinese guy and value cheese and wine more than many things.

I am currently living in San Francisco , working for Google (previously at RethinkDB) after having studied (hard?) in Chambéry , Lyon , Paris and Beijing.

This is a little blog that I use to convey my feelings to the world — or to just write down random thoughts.

The blog is built with Jekyll (and JekyllBootstrap), iconmonstr and is hosted on Github.

Michel Tu — michel@justonepixel.com — http://blog.justonepixel.com
